entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A few showers. High 13.
entry.summary: A few showers ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. High 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Overcast. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Overcast. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light before morning. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023
